thread.title: HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Naib Tehsildar Posts
thread.title_full: HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Naib Tehsildar Posts

author: publisher12
title: HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Naib Tehsildar Posts
text: Click here for Naib Tehsildar Post Details HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Teaching & Non Teaching Posts: Himachal Pradesh Public Service Commission (HPPSC) has announced a notification for the recruitment of Teaching & Non Teaching vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates may apply Online on or before 04-01-2017 till 11:59 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, examination fee & how to apply are given below… HPPSC Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Teaching & Non Teaching 1. Professor (Neurology) Class-I: 01 Post 2. Assistant Professor (CTVS): 01 Post 3. Associate Professor (Pediatric Surgery): 01 Post 4. Assistant Professor (Pediatric Surgery): 01 Post 5. Associate Professor (Plastic Surgery): 01 Post 6. Assistant Professor (Plastic Surgery): 01 Post 7. Acharya Class-I: 09 Posts 8. Principal (B. Pharmacy),Class-I: 02 Posts 9. Manager/ Project Manager (DIC), Class-II: 03 Posts 10.Assistant Director: 01 Post   be below 50 years for Post 1, 2, 3, 5, 45 years for Post 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 18-45 years for Post 10. Age relaxation is applicable as per H.P. Govt. rules.   D.M. Neurology/ MBBS for Post 1, M.Ch/ C.T.S/ MBBS for Post 2, M.Ch. Pediatric Surgery for Post 3, 4, M.Ch Plastic Surgery for Post 5, 6 recognized by MCI. For more information refer to notification.   applicants performance in screening test/ examination/ interview/ personality test. Examination Fee: Applicants required to pay Rs. 400/- for General category & Rs. 100/- for SC/ ST/ OBC candidates of HP through ‘e-Challan’ at any branch of Punjab National Bank or through ‘e-Payment’ option by using Debit or Credit Card of any Bank. Ex-Servicemen/ visually impaired candidates of H.P are exempted from this payment.   apply Online through the website www.hp.gov.in/hppsc on or before 04-01-2017 till 11:59 PM.. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying Online, Applicants should scan their photograph & signature. 2. Log in through the website “www.hp.gov.in/hppsc”. 3. Go to Notifications & Select the desired post and Read the Notification. 4. Click on “Apply Online —> “New User Sign up here”. 5. Fill all the details & Click on “Create User”. 6. Select the desired post & click on “Click to Apply”. 7. Fill all the details in the application form & then Submit OK. 8. Take printout of Online application for future use. Last Date to Apply Online: 04-01-2017 till 11:59 PM. For more details like Role Summary/ Purpose, category, tenure, remuneration, vacancy details, emolument, selection process, age relaxation, Salary and benefits, compensation & other information click on the link given below…. Click here to Apply Online - HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Naib Tehsildar Posts: Himachal Pradesh Public Service Commission (HPPSC) has given a notification for the recruitment of Naib Tehsildar, ‘A’Class,Class-II (Gazetted) on regular basis in the Department of Revenue, Himachal Pradesh. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 18-01-2017 till 11:59 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… HPPSC Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: Naib Tehsildar, ‘A’Class,Class-II (Gazetted) 1. General: 12 Posts 3. ST: 01 Post 4. OBC: 03 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 21 to 45 years as on 01-01-2016. The Upper age limit is relaxable as per Government’s instructions issued from time to time.   Graduation from a recognized University. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on Screening Test/ Preliminary Exam, Main Exam, Viva- Voce Test/ personal interview. Examination Fee: Candidates should pay Rs.400/- for General, Rs.100/- for SC/ ST/ OBC candidates through ‘e- Challan’ or ‘e-Payment’ option. No fee for Ex-Servicemen/ isually Impaired candidates.   apply online through the website www.hppsc.hp.gov.in/hppsc on or before 18-01-2017 till 11:59 PM (IST). Instruction to Apply Online: 1. Before applying to apply online candidates should have valid mail id and pass ward. 2. Candidates should log onto the website www.hppsc.hp.gov.in/hppsc. 3. Goto “Notifications” and select the desired post. 4. Read the Notification carefully and Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Read all the instructions carefully before applying and login. 6. Fill all the details carefully and submit the form. 7. Take the print out copy for future use. Last Date to Apply Online: 18-01-2017 till 11:59 PM (IST). For more details like desirable qualification, pay band, syllabus, exam pattern and other information click on the link given below… HPPSC Recruitment 2017
